name: The Carson Crossbody
description: The stylish Carson crossbody knitting pattern featuring two colors, an asymmetrical fold-over design, and a button closure. This pattern is perfect for knitters looking for a unique and functional project. Pattern is written in US terms.
full_text: The stylish Carson crossbody knitting pattern featuring two colors, an asymmetrical fold-over design, and a button closure. This pattern is perfect for knitters looking for a unique and functional project. Pattern is written in US terms. Materials: 319 yards (2 skeins) of Lion Brand 24/7 Cotton in Color A (Ecru) 325 Yards (2 skeins) of Lion Brand 24/7 Cotton in Color B (Taupe) 24” US size 4 (3.5mm) circular knitting needles 16” US size 3 (3.25mm) circular knitting needles 2” wooden toggle button Tapestry needle, scissors, tape measure Bag insert for stability (optional) Size: finished size is approx. 14” W X 14” H (tall side) 9” H (short side) X 3.5” D The Carson Crossbody is also available as a kit from Lion Brand Yarn.
